attributes.action: Make MP's that leave Political Parties in-between G.E's stand in By-Elections
attributes.additional_details: "The Independent Group" is the primary reason for this petition. There MP's left and have refused to stand in by-elections. The fact they are not forced is a mockery of our democratic system
attributes.background: MP's that change or leave parties may stand on a new manifesto meanwhile there previous manifesto they stood on may be the reason they were elected. MP's that leave or change parties should stand in by-elections to ensure that there constituents still want them as there representative.
